mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def median_mode_range(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    arr.sort()
    if n % 2 != 0:
        median = (arr[n // 2] + arr[n // 2 - 1]) / 2
    else:
        median = arr[n // 2]
    data = Counter(arr)
    get_mode = dict(data)
    mode = [k for (k, v) in get_mode.items() if v == max(list(data.values()))]
    min_val = min(arr)
    max_val = max(arr)
    range_val = max_val - min_val
    return (median, mode, range_val)

mutants.mutated_line: mode = [k for (k, v) in get_mode.items() if v != max(list(data.values()))]

        median = (arr[n // 2] + arr[n // 2 - -1]) / 2
    else:
        median = arr[n // 2]
    data = Counter(arr)
    get_mode = dict(data)
    mode = [k for (k, v) in get_mode.items() if v == max(list(data.values()))]
    min_val = min(arr)
    max_val = max(arr)
    range_val = max_val - min_val
    return (median, mode, range_val)
